thread.title: Shanghai stocks leap 7.82% at open on government boosts
thread.title_full: Shanghai stocks leap 7.82% at open on government boosts

title: Shanghai stocks leap 7.82% at open on government boosts
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Mon, Jul 6, 2015, 03:19 BST - UK Markets open in 4 hrs 41 mins Shanghai stocks leap 7.82% at open on government boosts AFP – 34 minutes ago View Photo 

China's benchmark Shanghai stock index surged 7.82 percent at the open on Monday after the government unveiled a raft of measures to boost the slumping market, including stabilisation funds and a halt to new share offers, dealers said. 
The Shanghai Composite Index soared 288.29 points to 3,975.21 while the Shenzhen Composite Index, which tracks stocks on China's second exchange, jumped 6.55 percent, or 137.50 points, to 2,235.98.
